item.title: LeetCode
item.description: LeetCode_每日一题 2.18-791. 找出星型图的中心节点 难度：简单 HashMap class Solution { public int findCenter (int[][] edges) { HashMap<Integer, Integer> hashMap = new HashMap<>(); int res = 0; for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++) { for (int j = 0; j < 2; j++) { if (hashMap.containsKey(edges[i][j])) { res = edges[i][j]; } hashMap.put(edges[i][j], 0); } } return res; } } 模拟 class Solution { public int findCenter(int[][] edges) { return edges[0][0] == edges[1][0] ?
